exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} xs, ys : list op k' : K ir : list IR Hnin : ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) Hforall : forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) k : K HinI : In (IRU k) ir Unable to unify "(fix In (a : op) (l : list op) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (I ?M1775) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)" with "(fix In (a : op) (l : list op) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) (I k) (xs ++ ys)".

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} xs, ys : list op k' : K ir : list IR Hnin : ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) Hforall : forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) k : K HinI : In (IRU k) ir Unable to unify "In (IRU k) ir" with "In (I k) (xs ++ ys)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys)

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
get_IR_output_keys = fun l : list IR => filterMap (fun x : IR => match x with | IRI _ => None | IRO k | IRU k => Some k end) l : list IR -> list K Arguments get_IR_output_keys _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
IRO_O_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRO_O_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
O_IRO_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> In (IRO k) ir
O_IRO_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In (IRO k) ir
good_trace_ind : forall P : list IR -> Prop -> Prop, P [] True -> (forall k : K, P [IRI k] False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRI k :: IRI k' :: ir) False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRO k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRU k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRO k :: ir) False) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRU k :: ir) False) -> forall ir : list IR, P ir (good_trace ir)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_IRU_In : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR) (k : K), In (IRU k) (acknowledge_all_ops_func l ir) -> In (I k) l
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
no_Ik_in_first2 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> forall k' : K, In (I k') (xs ++ ys) -> k <> k'
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
good_trace_IRI_in : forall ir : list IR, good_trace ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (IRO k) ir \/ In (IRU k) ir
good_trace_ind' : forall (P : list IR -> Prop -> Prop) (l : list IR), P [] True -> (forall k : K, P [IRI k] False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (l0 : list IR), P (IRI k :: IRI k' :: l0) False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (l0 : list IR), P l0 (good_trace l0) -> P (IRI k :: IRO k' :: l0) (k = k' /\ good_trace l0)) -> (forall (k k' : K) (l0 : list IR), P l0 (good_trace l0) -> P (IRI k :: IRU k' :: l0) (k = k' /\ good_trace l0)) -> (forall (k : K) (l0 : list IR), P (IRO k :: l0) False) -> (forall (k : K) (l0 : list IR), P (IRU k :: l0) False) -> P l (good_trace l)
good_move_IU_neq : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_move (IRI k) (IRU k')
op_equivalent_all_Is_O_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') xs -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (xs ++ O k :: ys) (O k :: xs ++ ys)
NoDup_get_op_input_keys_In_2_3 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> False
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
get_IR_output_keys_complete_U : forall (xs : list IR) (k : K), In (IRU k) xs -> In k (get_IR_output_keys xs)
IR_equiv_AAOF_II_neq : forall (xs ys : list op) (target : list IR) (k k' : K), k <> k' -> op_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func ys target) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k :: I k' :: xs) target) (acknowledge_all_ops_func (I k' :: I k :: ys) target)
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_O : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ O k :: ys)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> False
good_op_move_good_move_IO : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (I k) (O k') -> good_move (IRI k) (IRO k')
op_equivalent_all_Is_I_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x xs -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (xs ++ I k :: ys) (I k :: xs ++ ys)
good_op_move_neq_IO : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_op_move (I k) (O k')
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_2_3 : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> False
op_equivalent_all_Is_O : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') l -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (l ++ [O k]) (O k :: l)
get_op_input_keys_complete : forall (xs : list op) (k : K), In (I k) xs -> In k (get_op_input_keys xs)
good_move_IO_neq : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_move (IRI k) (IRO k')
not_good_op_move_OI : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (O k) (I k') -> False
get_IR_output_keys_complete_O : forall (xs : list IR) (k : K), In (IRO k) xs -> In k (get_IR_output_keys xs)
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
get_op_input_keys_sound : forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_input_keys l) -> In (I k) l
acknowledged_op_I_cons_reduce : forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l) -> acknowledged_op k l
acknowledged_op_I_cons_expand : forall (k k' : K) (l : list op), acknowledged_op k l -> acknowledged_op k (I k' :: l)
good_op_move_II : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (I k) (I k')
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
get_IR_input_keys_complete : forall (xs : list IR) (k : K), In (IRI k) xs -> In k (get_IR_input_keys xs)
op_equivalent_all_Is_I : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall x : op, In x l -> exists k0 : K, x = I k0) -> op_equivalent (l ++ [I k]) (I k :: l)
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope

intros xs ys k' ir Hnin Hforall k HinI.
